definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: It strikes a tone of irreverence and sarcasm that teenagers often appreciate.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們都喜歡廣告裏面那種不甚恭敬和諷刺的基調。

sentences.english: This tone has prevailed through subsequent commemorations and debates.
sentences.chinese: 這一基調在過去的紀念活動和辯論中成爲主流。

sentences.english: When choosing actors, the Assistant Director needs to pay attention to the basic tone of the character.
sentences.chinese: 副導演挑選演員時需把握好上述人物基調。

sentences.english: Shimmery deep gold, with an opaque rusty brown base.
sentences.chinese: 不透明鏽褐色基調上閃耀着深金色。

sentences.english: And pessimism, sarcasm or silence becomes the dominant style of family communications.
sentences.chinese: 而悲觀，冷嘲熱諷或沉默則成爲家庭溝通的主基調。

sentences.english: The adornments do not cohere with the basic design.
sentences.chinese: 裝飾物與設計的基調不協調。

sentences.english: Pearlescent pewter with turquoise shimmer over a charcoal base.
sentences.chinese: 在炭灰色基調上閃耀着珠光錫金與綠松石光芒。

sentences.english: I do a one hour very funny keynote called "The Power of Partnerships".
sentences.chinese: 我會做長達一小時的基調解說，叫“合作的力量”。

sentences.english: Tenor of discourse is the sub-field of Systemic Functional Linguistics.
sentences.chinese: 話語基調是系統功能語言學研究的領域。

sentences.english: The insertion that suckles white sofa changed approximately callous fundamental key.
sentences.chinese: 奶白色沙發的插入改變了近乎冷酷的基調。

sentences.english: The wedding breakfast scene take the red color as a main key, provides the self-service dining.
sentences.chinese: 喜宴現場以大紅色爲基調，提供自助餐飲。

sentences.english: This really provides the central rhetorical base for Milton's Lycidas.
sentences.chinese: 這爲彌爾頓的《利西達斯》提供了行文基調。

sentences.english: When designing its space, the color of beige was widely employed to create a warm and harmonious tone.
sentences.chinese: 空間設計上大量運用米色，營造溫暖與和諧的基調。

sentences.english: Then follows the “emotional tone” of the product.
sentences.chinese: 那麼就請跟隨產品的“感情基調”吧。

sentences.english: Ensure that the General Assembly adopt a resolution not less strong than those passed at the previous sessions.
sentences.chinese: 爭取聯大通過的決議基調不低於去年。

sentences.english: Ashton's new powerful bluetongue amplifiers set a new benchmark for tone and affordability.
sentences.chinese: 阿什頓的新的放大器確定一個新基調和音準。

definition: harmonious/to mediate/to reconcile/to compromise/mediation/to mix/to blend/blended/to season/seasoning/to placate
